member.name: T:Castle.DynamicLinqQueryBuilder.QueryBuilder
member.summary: Generic IQueryable filter implementation. Based upon configuration of FilterRules mapping to the data source. When applied, acts as an advanced filter mechanism.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether incoming dates in the filter should be parsed as UTC.
